name: semantic-styled-ui
description: Set of UI components based of Semantic UI with Styled Components
author: Zach Hardesty <hello@zachhardesty.com> (https://zachhardesty.com)

scripts.link:all: yarn link react && yarn link react-dom && yarn link styled-components && yarn link semantic-ui-css
scripts.link:gc: export LINKSSUI=../gulf-corp/node_modules || set LINKSSUI=../gulf-corp/node_modules&& yarn register && yarn link:all
scripts.link:cd: export LINKSSUI=../connectdoor/website/node_modules || set LINKSSUI=../connectdoor/website/node_modules&& yarn register && yarn link:all
scripts.link:zh: export LINKSSUI=../zachhardesty.com/node_modules || set LINKSSUI=../zachhardesty.com/node_modules&& yarn register && yarn link:all
scripts.link:ls: echo $(tput bold)currently linked pkgs, run `yarn link:lsa` for pkg locations:$(tput sgr0); (ls -l node_modules; ls -l node_modules/@*) | grep ^l | grep -o "[[:alpha:]][[:alpha:]][[:alpha:]] [[:digit:]][[:digit:]].*$"
scripts.link:lsa: echo $(tput bold)linkable / registered pkgs:$(tput sgr0); ls -la ~/.config/yarn/link/ | grep ^l | grep -o "[[:alpha:]][[:alpha:]][[:alpha:]] [[:digit:]][[:digit:]].*$"
scripts.build: yarn run clean && yarn run babel
